title: Endura Speed Pedelec Helmet gets Koroyd Core and visor for the ebike commute
content:
The Endura Speed Pedelec is their new ebike helmet designed for the ebike commuter. A Koroyd Core, extended coverage, integrated adjustable visor and a sporty look make this a very attractive option for commuters everywhere, not just those who ride ebikes. Let’s take a closer look. Endura Speed Pedelec EBike Helmet An ebike helmet? Really? […]

The post Endura Speed Pedelec Helmet gets Koroyd Core and visor for the ebike commute appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
